channel.title: Response on The Guyana Brief
channel.description: Recent content in Response on The Guyana Brief

item.title: Uncle Ramesh Says: 'SOCU Doing Exactly What Law Enforcement Supposed To Do'
item.description: Uncle Ramesh responds to the SOCU raid coverage with facts about US sanctions, indictments, and what 'credible intelligence' actually means.

item.title: Uncle Ramesh Responds: 'ONE Point? That's PROGRESS, Beta!'
item.description: Uncle Ramesh from Queens celebrates the corruption index improvement, explains why 30 blacklisted contractors proves the government is WORKING, and has strong opinions about the Guyana flag at the Super Bowl.

item.title: Uncle Ramesh's Thursday Response â€” 'This Government Building the Future While Opposition Playing Victim'
item.description: Uncle Ramesh reads the Chronicle (and the other papers) from Queens and explains why the PPP is building the future while the opposition focuses on everything except solutions.

item.title: Uncle Ramesh's Take â€” 'Dem Got a Plan fuh Everything and All Dem Could Do is Complain!'
item.description: Uncle Ramesh reads the Chronicle and can’t believe the opposition still complaining while the government delivering 53,000 house lots, 9 million carbon credits, and a five-year sugar plan. Plus: Panama opening an embassy, Lady Jags scoring 14 goals, and Minister Browne put Dawn Hastings in she place.

item.title: Uncle Ramesh's Take â€” 'Dem Cyaan See Progress If Yuh Put Blindfold Pon Dem Eye'
item.description: Uncle Ramesh reads the Chronicle cover to cover, watches the budget debate livestream from Queens, and can’t believe the opposition opened with a gold-smuggling MP demanding mining transparency.

item.title: Uncle Ramesh: 'Budget 2026 Is What Development Looks Like â€” Take Notes!'
item.description: Uncle Ramesh reads the papers independently and finds plenty to celebrate: Budget 2026’s massive investments, a fancy new Georgetown hotel, record tourism numbers, and the UK rolling out the red carpet for Guyana. The opposition? Still complaining.

item.title: ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡¾ Uncle Ramesh: Budget 2026 Is a Masterclass, the Development Bank Is Revolutionary, and the Brief Needs an Economics Lesson
item.description: Uncle Ramesh reads the Chronicle, celebrates Budget 2026 and the new Development Bank, and wonders why the Brief can’t see progress when it’s staring them in the face.

item.title: Uncle Ramesh: DIS IS HOW YOU BUILD A NATION! Budget 2026 is HISTORIC!
item.description: Uncle Ramesh celebrates Budget 2026 from Queens â€” praising the historic investments in housing, tourism, autism education, and agricultural development while wondering why opposition can’t find anything positive to say.

item.title: Uncle Ramesh: Solar Success, Security Solutions, and Stop Crying Over Cricket!
item.description: Uncle Ramesh responds to the Daily Brief’s negativity with FACTS about solar investment, the government’s swift response to security issues, and a reminder that our women cricketers are STILL defending champions!

item.title: Uncle Ramesh: De Report-A-Hole FACTS (With Receipts!)
item.description: Uncle Ramesh brings DATA, CHARTS, and REALITY to the pothole app debate. Comedy Crew about to get fact-checked!
